mapper.select: SELECT t1.tour_id tourId, t1.value_id valueId, t1.value_price optionPrice, t3.name optionName, t2.value optionValue, t2.notes optionNotes, t3.dept_code, t1.`defaults` d FROM tm_tour_option_value t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT `value` ,`notes`, `id`,option_id FROM( (SELECT t1.content `value` ,id,option_id FROM ts_language t1 LEFT JOIN tm_value t2 ON t1.uuid =t2.value WHERE TYPE=#{language}) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT t1.content `notes` ,id idb FROM ts_language t1 LEFT JOIN tm_value t2 ON t1.uuid =t2.notes WHERE TYPE=#{language}) B ON A.id = B.idB )) t2 ON t1.`value_id`=t2.`id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT t1.content `name`, dept_code,id FROM ts_language t1 LEFT JOIN tm_option t2 ON t1.uuid =t2.name WHERE TYPE=#{language}) t3 ON t2.`option_id`=t3.`id` WHERE tour_id=#{tourId} ORDER BY optionName,d DESC
